description:
USN-5173-1 fixed vulnerabilities in libmodbus.
This update provides the corresponding updates for Ubuntu 14.04 ESM and
Ubuntu 16.04 ESM.

Original advisory details:

 It was discovered that libmodbus incorrectly handled inputs. An attacker
 could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service or other
 unspecified impact.

libmodbus.description: Library to send/receive data according to the Modbus protocol
Library to send/receive data according to the Modbus protocol

title: libmodbus vulnerabilities
action: In general, a standard system update will make all the necessary changes.
isummary:
libmodbus could be made to crash if it received specially crafted
input.
